CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Ryanmouth?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Ryanmouth is arc {Brandonburgh}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Jackfort?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Jackfort is arc {Christine}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Brandonburgh to Jackfort in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Jackfort to Brandonburgh in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Brandonburgh and Jackfort in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Brandonburgh and Jackfort is {201}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Jackfort and Angelaview in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Jackfort and Angelaview is {106}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Ryanmouth?
SC.A: The total flow output from Ryanmouth is {210}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Jackfort?
SC.A: The total flow input by Jackfort is {304}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 214? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {219} from {Brandonburgh} to {Ryanmouth}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 63? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {32} from {Christine} to {Jackfort}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 105 and 160? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {106} from {Angelaview} to {Jackfort}, a flow of {154} from {Jackfort} to {Angelaview}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Christine to Angelaview or from Jackfort to Christine?
NC.A: The flow from {Christine} to {Angelaview} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Jackfort to Angelaview, from Brandonburgh to Jackfort, or from Christine to Jackfort?
NC.A: The flow from {Brandonburgh} to {Jackfort} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Jackfort}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Brandonburgh} and {Ryanmouth}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Christine, Arc Angelaview, Arc Jackfort, Arc Brandonburgh, Arc Ryanmouth}.
